entry.title: Distributed Systems Notes
entry.summary: 1. RPC and Multi-Threads reason for multi-threads: I/O concurrency Parallelism(multiple cores, true parallelism, multiple cpu cycles per second) Convenience(fire something every some seconds in loop waiting for separate work; notice to exit every routine gracefully! otherwise accumulating in background!) what if not use multi-threads while still enabling multiple servers to communicate...
